mangalsutras.name: Classic Gold Mangalsutra
mangalsutras.description: Traditional gold mangalsutra with black beads, symbolizing protection and prosperity.

mangalsutras.name: Diamond Pendant Mangalsutra
mangalsutras.description: Modern mangalsutra with a sparkling diamond pendant set in gold.

mangalsutras.name: Vati Mangalsutra
mangalsutras.description: Features two gold cup-shaped pendants (vatis) on a black and gold beaded chain, representing the union of Shiva and Parvati.

mangalsutras.name: Dejhoor Mangalsutra
mangalsutras.description: Kashmiri Dejhoor mangalsutra, originally an ear adornment, now worn as a necklace symbolizing the marriage of Shiva and Shakti.

mangalsutras.name: Sindhi Mangalsutra
mangalsutras.description: Gold pendant on a black and gold beaded necklace, gifted by the husband on the wedding day.

mangalsutras.name: Taagpaag Mangalsutra
mangalsutras.description: Bihari Taagpaag mangalsutra with arc-shaped pendants and black beaded chain.

mangalsutras.name: Kannada Mangalsutra
mangalsutras.description: Intricately woven gold chains with black beads and a central pendant, sometimes adorned with emeralds or rubies.

mangalsutras.name: Telugu Mangalsutra
mangalsutras.description: Features two gold discs tied with yellow thread, later united with black and coral beads on a gold wire.

mangalsutras.name: Tamil Thaali
mangalsutras.description: Simple gold chain with a pendant, often engraved with deities or auspicious symbols.

mangalsutras.name: Kerala Ela Thali
mangalsutras.description: Leaf-shaped gold pendant (Ela) on a long chain, sometimes inscribed with Om or other Hindu symbols.

mangalsutras.name: Kerala Minnu
mangalsutras.description: Gold medallion with a cross, worn on seven strands of thread, symbolizing love and faith.

mangalsutras.name: Floral Diamond Mangalsutra
mangalsutras.description: Designer floral pendant mangalsutra with diamonds for special occasions.

mangalsutras.name: Short Mangalsutra Necklace
mangalsutras.description: Short, minimalist mangalsutra necklace for modern brides.

mangalsutras.name: Beaded Mangalsutra
mangalsutras.description: Traditional beaded mangalsutra for everyday elegance.

mangalsutras.name: Antique Temple Mangalsutra
mangalsutras.description: Antique temple design mangalsutra with ruby stones.

mangalsutras.name: Kundan Mangalsutra
mangalsutras.description: Designer kundan work mangalsutra for special occasions.

mangalsutras.name: Pearl Drop Mangalsutra
mangalsutras.description: Modern mangalsutra with a pearl drop pendant.

mangalsutras.name: Minimalist Mangalsutra Chain
mangalsutras.description: Simple gold mangalsutra chain for daily use.

mangalsutras.name: Designer Diamond Mangalsutra
mangalsutras.description: Contemporary diamond-studded mangalsutra for glamorous events.

mangalsutras.name: Gujarati Vati Mangalsutra
mangalsutras.description: Gujarati vati mangalsutra with two gold cups on a black and gold beaded chain.
